member.name: T:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator
member.summary: Specifies the comparison operation to perform.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.Equal
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotEqual
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is different than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.GreaterThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is greater than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.LessThan
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.GreaterThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.LessThanOrEqualTo
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is less than or equal to the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.Between
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is greater than or equal to the Value1 property and less than or equal to Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotBetween
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is less than the Value1 property or greater than Value2 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.Contains
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is a substring of Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotContains
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is not a substring of Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.BeginsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition begins with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.EndsWith
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition ends with the Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.IsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotIsNull
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.IsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is null (Nothing) or System.DBNull or an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotIsEmpty
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is not null (Nothing) nor System.DBNull nor an empty string.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.In
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is equal to at least one of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.ConditionOperator.NotIn
member.summary: The condition is met when the value of the field attached to a format or filter condition is not equal to any of the values in a list specified in Value1 property.

member.summary: Groups are calculated using the option specified in the DefaultGroupInterval property of the field grouped.

member.summary: Groups are calculated using the values of the item.

member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the first character of the text of an item.

member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the date portion of a DateTime value. The time portion is ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Month
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the month and year portions of a DateTime value. The day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Quarter
member.summary: Groups are calculated based using the quarter and year that a DateTime value belongs.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Year
member.summary: Groups are calculated using only the year of a DateTime value. The month, day and time portions are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Hour
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date and the hour of a DateTime value. minutes and seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Minute
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours and the minutes of a DateTime value. seconds are ignored.

member.name: F:Janus.Windows.TimeLine.GroupInterval.Second
member.summary: Groups are calculated using the date, the hours, the minutes and the second of a DateTime value.
